text:
Harold Hill
March 7, I960
As for the expenses on my trips, I’m not sure how complete you
need the memo but as I recall the form I signed asked for a
rather detailed statement. If you don’t need all the information
I am supplying I will be most happy to cut it down. If you need
additional information I will reluctantly supply it, but in the
meantime push them along since I am travelling on KTCA’s funds
and the business office is glaring down the hall suggesting I
clear up these items•
R. Tettemer
Director of School Programs
CRT/gvc
Enel,
Tu
